content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
What is the setup for updating this page?

https://isabelle.in.tum.de/community/Projects

The most recent entry on it is dated 2017, and there is only one of those.

Larry

From: Fabian Huch <huch@in.tum.de>
The community wiki is indeed quite out of date. There was a discussion a
few years ago whether to deactivate it and nobody objected.

Hence, it is going to be deactivated soon.

Fabian

On 10/28/24 16:36, Lawrence Paulson wrote:
